text: Michael Thomas McCaul, Sr. (born January 14, 1962) is the U.S. Representative for , serving since 2005. Since the beginning of the 113th Congress, he has been the Chairman of the House Committee on Homeland Security. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==Other websites== * Congressman Michael McCaul official U.S. House site * Michael McCaul for Congress * * * * Profile at SourceWatch Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from Dallas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Michael McCaul
